sameAnalysis.word_list: fragrance, odour, flaour, smell, perfume, scent, incense
means: fragrance ： 较正式的典雅用词，常指花妆品、花朵和香料等发出的令人感到新鲜、愉快的香味。
odour ： 书面中性词，侧重气味本身的本质，既可指令人愉快的气味，也可指令人作呕难闻气味。
flaour ： 指影响嗅觉、味觉的香气或香味，多用于指食物等独特的味。
smell ： 普通用词，与odour很相近，中性词。可指好闻或不好闻或中性气味。
perfume ： 书面用词，指强烈、浓厚天然或人工制造的香气。
scent与smell很接近，但着重某物质或物体所特有的气味，多指好闻的气味。
incense ： 指香燃烧时发出的芳香的烟味。

sentence.Network_en: The savoury smell greeted them as they went through the door.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们进门时一阵香味扑鼻而来。

sentence.Network_en: I could smell the honeyed ripeness of melons and peaches.
sentence.Network_cn: 我能闻到瓜桃熟透了的香甜味道。

sentence.Network_en: The barn was filled with the sour-sweet smell of fresh dung.
sentence.Network_cn: 谷仓里弥漫着新粪酸甜的气味。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 莱赫曼的故事原本发表在1950年的《》杂志上，当时由于杂志主编不希望“气味”（smell）这个词出现在出版物上于是更名为《告诉我明天什么样！》。这个故事是根据作者自己给《好莱坞报道》专栏作家.
小学六年级毕业英语复习资料 ... taste 尝 smell 闻 hang up 挂起.
[海明威的《老人与海》词汇表] - 豆丁网 ... east n. 东， 东方 smell n. 气味； 嗅觉 harbour n. 港， 港口， 安全处， 避难所.
adj_百度百科 ... look 看起来 smell 闻起来 taste 尝起来.

list.abs: 异味(Peculiar smell)、瘙痒——恐怕是真菌性阴道炎或阴道(Vaginal)滴虫病。在禁锢之前，你是自由的； 要是在孕珠时候患上了真菌 …
smell prism 嗅觉棱柱体smell receptor 嗅觉感受器smell threshold 嗅觉阈限
大学英语四级常用词组 ... smell about 到处嗅寻；到处找 smell of 有…的气味 smell out 嗅出，凭嗅觉发现….
大学英语四级常用词组 ... smell of 有…的气味 smell out 嗅出，凭嗅觉发现… smile on 对…赞许.
『自考』综合英语(二)上册短语总结 ... figure out 搞清楚，想清楚 smell out 察觉 count out 数出.

jx.jx_en_mean: discern weakness or vulnerability in an opponent
(N. Amer. informal)enjoy or appreciate what is often ignored
jx.jx_cn_mean: (北美，非正式)享受（或欣赏）常被忽略的事物

jx.jx_en_mean: To suspect that something is wrong.

entry.def: The smell of something is a quality it has which you become aware of when you breathe in through your nose.

example.tran: 新鲜出炉的面包的香味

entry.def: Your sense of smell is the ability that your nose has to detect things.

example.ex: ...people who lose their sense of smell.

entry.def: If something smells in a particular way, it has a quality which you become aware of through your nose.

example.tran: 房间里有股柠檬的味道。

entry.def: If you say that something smells, you mean that it smells unpleasant.

example.ex: Ma threw that out. She said it smelled...
example.tran: 妈把那玩意扔出去了，她说它有股怪味。

entry.def: If you smell something, you become aware of it when you breathe in through your nose.

example.ex: As soon as we opened the front door we could smell the gas.
example.tran: 我们一打开前门，就闻到了煤气的味道。

entry.def: If you smell something, you put your nose near it and breathe in, so that you can discover its smell.

example.ex: I took a fresh rose out of the vase on our table, and smelled it.
example.tran: 我从饭桌上的花瓶里抽了一只新鲜的玫瑰，闻了闻。

entry.def: If you smell something, you feel that it is likely to happen or be true.

example.ex: He knew virtually nothing about music but he could smell a hit.
example.tran: 他对音乐几乎一窍不通，却预感到它将会大受欢迎。

means.word_mean: 1. the sensation that results when olfactory receptors in the nose are stimulated by particular chemicals in gaseous form;
2. any property detected by the olfactory system
3. the general atmosphere of a place or situation and the effect that it has on people;

sentences.sentence: "the feel of the city excited him"
"a clergyman improved the tone of the meeting"

means.word_mean: 5. the act of perceiving the odor of something
1. inhale the odor of; perceive by the olfactory sense

list.explanation: (用鼻孔)吸粉末状毒品(常指吸可卡因)

example.en: One of those guys shoots it；the others smell it up.
example.zh: 那些人当中有一个人注射毒品，另外一些人则嗅吸毒品。

example.en: You must be smelling the stuff.
example.zh: 你准是在吸那东西(指毒品)。

example.en: Barlowc squinted a bit. Something smells fishy here, he thought.
example.zh: 巴洛威偷偷瞥了一眼。他觉得这儿有可疑之处。

example.en: The Democrats smelled blood over the trade issue.
example.zh: 民主党准备在贸易问题上开刀。

example.en: This kitchen smells to high heaven. What besides garlic are you cooking?
example.zh: 厨房里臭气熏天。除了大蒜之外，你还在烧什么菜？

example.en: Something's wrong here. Somebody blabbed. This setup smells to heaven.
example.zh: 这儿出 了点问题。有人泄露了秘密。这台检测器发出了可疑信号。

auth_sentence.content: It's certainly hard to smell your own armpits.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's certainly hard to smell your own armpits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's certainly hard to smell your own armpits.

auth_sentence.content: They are also given things to taste and smell.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are also given things to taste and smell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are also given things to taste and smell.

auth_sentence.content: The smell of the whole farm was also reduced.
auth_sentence.res_content: The smell of the whole farm was also reduced.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The smell of the whole farm was also reduced.

sentences.en: Dogs have a marvellous sense of smell.
Have a smell of this wine, does it smell all right?
sentences.cn: 闻闻这酒, 没问题吧?

sentences.en: There was a sweetish smell, vaguely reminiscent of coffee.
sentences.cn: 有一股甜甜的气味, 使人隐隐觉得像是咖啡。

sentences.en: The poor boy smelled the delicious odour of cooked meat.
sentences.cn: 这可怜的孩子闻到了香喷喷的肉味。
我母亲闻到什么东西烧焦的味道。

sentences.en: My horse can always smell when rain is coming.
sentences.cn: 我的马凭嗅觉总能知道何时下雨。
接着他闻到了烧饭的气味。

jushi.english: The faint sweet smell of flowers lay in the air.
jushi.chinese: 花的芳香在空气中飘溢。
